meanings: (단단한 물체가) break, be[get] broken, fracture, (무게·압력 등으로) give way, (딱 소리를 내며) snap (off)

vlive.korean: 장준 씨가 아주 똑부러져요. Jang Jun really speaks his mind. 듣기 View video Golden Child : [FULL] Golden Child 3RD MINI ALBUM [WISH] COMEBACK SHOWCASE
vlive.english: Jang Jun really speaks his mind.

vlive.korean: 이 안에는, 제가 손톱이 잘 부러져요. Inside... my nails easily break. 듣기 View video 카모마일T (Chamomile_T) : 카모마일T의 뷰티 Q&A 시간! / Chamomile_t's beauty Q&A
왜왜? - 부러져! 부러질 거 같아. Why? - It'll break. I think it'll break. 듣기 View video FTISLAND : [FULL] FTISLAND 여름밤의 꿈 COMEBACK VLIVE [DRIVE-IN FTISLAND]
vlive.english: Why? - It'll break. I think it'll break.

vlive.korean: 그래서 처음으로 다리 부러져 본 게 그때. That's when I first broke my leg. 듣기 View video 키워드#보아 - my SMTelevision : [키워드#보아] Ep.58 그땐 그랬지~ 보아의 어린시절 이야기
vlive.english: That's when I first broke my leg.

vlive.korean: 그렇지 않아? 언니 이거 잘 부러지잖아. - 잘 부러져. Don't you think so? This breaks easily. - It breaks easily. 듣기 View video V PICK! HOW-TO : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 에이프릴 나은 ’예쁜게 죄’ 커버 메이크업 (HOW TO DO April Naeun ‘Oh my mistake’ Cover Makeup)
vlive.english: Don't you think so? This breaks easily. - It breaks easily.
